content: Wonders of architecture and design dominate this week’s collection of the web’s best, with everything from brilliantly green accountants’ offices to incredible treehouse hotels and opulent jet interiors. Top this off with a bunch of crooked finance ministers and some frankly baffling pseudoscientific therapies, and it’s a recipe for some seriously cool linkage.
title: 5 Coolest Links of the Week
author: Karl Fabricius
